column1: I have to say that this product is simply amazing what it does for your skin !!It is so creamy and a little bit goes along way.Buy it ladies you won't regret it and it smells so good and I received those as a compliment gift And I truly cannot stop raving about these wonderful beautiful products [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the sample on December 15th and have been using it daily for a month now. I had my husband take before and after photos of me wearing the same clothes and makeup. The lighting was a little different. It feels really good going on and my skin feels smoother and softer. I have a but yellow undertone to my skin so I think it helped cool it some. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

As I age my skin tone became shallow. It didn't take long for Age Perfect yo give my skin tone that dewy pink undertone and glow women want. I will never be 25 again, but as a 69 year old woman, I still want to look healthy and vibrant. Age Perfect. Is great!
Thank ypu Loreal! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this product for 3 weeks. I love that it is non greasy on my skin and the moisture lasts the entire day. I do feel my skin is Rosy and more youthful. I received this product to use in my home and to give my honest opinion. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This L'Oréal Age Perfect Rosy Tone moisturizer is a nice day cream for people with mature skin. I would prefer an unscented moisturizer, but it doesn't seem too heavy. This product has given me just a hint of color but not too much. I received this product complimentary for my honest feedback. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really love Loreal Cell Renewal Rosy Tone Cream! It's like it was made just for me! The cream has a real nice consistency and my face feels so smooth and soft after applying. I like that it's not greasy at all which is a plus! I found that I don't even have to wear liquid makeup if I don't want to as this amazing cream gives me a nice rosy glow! I'm so happy I received this product complimentary for testing purposes from Influenster! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this item a little over 3 wks ago at no cost to trial and provide my review. I began using it immediately. This moisturizer has a nice fragrance, smooths on easy, and feels as soft as a rose pedal. It absorbs into my skin providing a light touch of color to my pale skin. Like myself it's a great moisturizer for the older woman. At this time I have not noticed any cell renewal, only softness to my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product totally surprised me it is luscious and so smooth it glides on your skin. I applied to this at night and love the way my face felt of the morning. My face feels younger and looks brighter [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Rosy Tone skin moisturizer works really well in fact a little too well for me! I have pretty oily skin even at age 50, so I have to use a very light touch with this product. Otherwise my skin will feel really oily. The packaging is really pretty and the moisturizer is a gorgeous rosy pink color. I received the product complimentary for testing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used this moisturizer three different times on the days I tested it. Each time my face began to sweat as if I had just worked out. I currently use a face moisturizer, therefore, I know it is not my skin type. Also my complexion is very dark and it did not have the Rosy Glow. This was sent to me to test as an Influenster! I received this product complimentary for review purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was not a fan, too many chemicals, didn't do a thing. No noticeable difference, and I really don't like mica or scented creams on my face. This was provided free of charge by Influenster for review purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

L'OREAL Rosy tone cell renewal moisturizer was wonderful to use. Made my face bright and smooth. The texture was rich and creamy. Didn't notice a peony sense or smell to the moisturizer when applying. Used for the past week every morning before applying foundation. Received a complimentary bottle for review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received L'oreal's Age Perfect Rosy Tone Cell Renewal free from Influenster for my review. It has a pleasant scent, sort of like roses, and feels good on my skin. My complexion is kind of sallow and this cream does take it away. It has a slightly sparkly sheen, but it's quickly absorbed and looks natural under makeup. It does brighten my skin and doesn't feel oily. I wear it alone at home [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product almost a week ago compliments of Influenster to test it and review it. Well all I can say is.... so far so good!!!! I am seeing an improvement on my face already! If it works this good this fast then I can't wait to see the results a month from now! Stay tuned world!! This grandma is lookin' good!! Before & current photos below. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am blessed enough not to have many issues with my face or my skin for my age group. I do have a few areas where my tone is uneven. I received this product as a sample, for testing purposes and I am very happy with the results. It was not greasy and did not leave a residue. My face felt soft and not greasy or oily after use. I look forward to continued use of this product after my sample is finished. This is a definite purchase. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just started to use Rosy Tone Moisturizer and Eye Brightener. I have to say I am amazed how soft my skin feels and about the healthy glow, I can see, even after a short use. I can recommend this produdt. I received both products as part of a free testing from Influenster which did in no way affrct my honest review

I love how my skin looks and feels after using this over several days. Definitely gave my skin a rosy glow! I received this complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I received this this product from Influenster. I have tried this and love it! I will continue to use it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Would love the product if it didn't have the rosey additive. My face has a natural rosey color to it and adding this product to it just makes it worse [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This was complimentary For review purposes. I really like the light creamy texture. I also like the rosy color. I gave my skin good moisturization [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this from influenster and I am so pleased they picked me. For the first time my husband commented on my skin. He said It really looked healthy. From him that's high praise [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Thank you I love this Rosey tone moisturizer my skin looks so bright no dull look anymore I apply day and night
I received this product compliments for testing and I am not disappointed [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this to test it and I really like how easy it goes on and how it makes my under eyes lighter. I like the tint and the fact that it looks and feels natural! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

What a genius product! I wake up and still feel tired and put this on - and BAM! I look awake, and literally rosy! It's very moisturizing, which also revives my appearance. My skin FEELS great, and that revives my soul!
I received this complimentary product to try from Influenster, but I absolutely will be buying it in the future! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a complimentary jar to test on my face. This daily moisturizer instantly revived my skin. It helped exfoliate my dry, dull skin and renewed my face back to it's pink tone. I highly recommend it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was sent this product complimentary. I was pretty sceptical at first. I don't follow directions very well so I applied this to my face and neck before bed. I expected to wake up an oily mess. Let's face it, I'm an oily skin girl. I got up, fixed my coffee and processed to apply makeup. My skin was fuller and had a distinct healthy glow. I've continued using the Cell Renewal Rosy Tone Moisturizer every day since. I am obsessed with this! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this moisturizer complimentary to review and I have to say I was really excited to try it! I was sad that the smell and texture really were not so appealing to me. It felt a little gritty and the smell was no to good. I did use it a couple of days to see if it was moisturizing my skin and it was pretty good but not my first pick! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this rosy tone moisturizer by loreal from influenster. I am using this product complimentary for testing purposes. This product is so amazing, it leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. I can see my. wrinkles have diminished and my skin feels so smooth bringing back a more youthful appearance. Thank you [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this Day Cream complimentary from Influenster for a trial. This is a very thick cream so you do not need to use a lot of it. It does not feel heavy or greasy and works well under makeup. I am hoping with regular use it will dimish the fine lines around my eyes. Over all I would say this is a very nice product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product has a thick consistence. It guilds on and is well absorbs by the skin. It has little to no scent. It has a peachy hue yet goes on clear. Giving you a radiant lite from within look. Very nice everyday moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like this rosy toned cream. Feels very nice going on and not greasy, just creamy. I saw an ad for it on an older actress and since I am "older" thought I would try. Very nice, and I like not wearing makeup occassionally and this just ads a nice glow.
In just a few days my skin has a new youthful glow and feels soft and supple. This product has done wonders for my 70 year old skin.

I received this product to do a review on. I do like the product. For me and my oily skin it feels heavy by the time I apply enough to feel moisturized. The rosy tone is nice. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recieved this from influenster and one of their boxes. Love it. Works all day, under my makeup and doesn't feel greasy. Im 52 so this is great for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm approaching 74 fast. I have natural rosy undertone to my skin. But after trying a sample I was sent. I love and need the moisturized and healthy look I get without using a makeup that tends to show during daytime.
Moisturizes well...puts a few roses in my cheeks... I look like; Whatever Happened to Baby Jane, when I wear makeup...so.... It's L'Oreal....they know what they're doing!

I was sent this to try and then review. I love the product. I almost 68. This made my skin feel amazing, wrinkles (which I have few) were less visible and people said I had a glow. Thank you ..you made me feel more beautiful [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I noticed the skin on my forehead felt rough and was afraid the rest of my face would become leather-like. Using Perfect Rosy Tone Moisturizer for just one week has my entire face feeling smooth and youthful. This rich moisturizer is just what dry, thirsty skin needs. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been looking for the perfect product for my aging skin and finally found it with this product. My skin is smooth and glowing. My mild rosecea and spider veins in my face also seem to be lighter. I'm 62 and most people guess my age to be mid 40s. Thank you loreal for this wonderful product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I loved the way it made my skin feel and look, definitely worth buying again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This is very heavy and feels smothering to the face. My skin wants to breakout. Was not what I expected. Would not purchase again.
This is an amazing face moisturizer, Skin feels soft and hydrant all day along. Hard to find in Fiji but I usually buy from USA.

I am definitely aging faster than I want. This Age Perfect Cell Renewal is a good addition to my skin care regimen. The cream is somewhat thick and pink in color. It spreads on easily and has a light tint to hide redness, age spots and more. It works to moisturize, hydrate and exfoliate your skin while stimulating new cell growth closer to the surface. With continued use, your skin will look brighter and smoother. I recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product has a thick consistence. It guilds on and is well absorbs by the skin. It has little to no scent. It has a peachy hue yet goes on clear. Giving you a radiant lite from within look. Very nice everyday moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like this rosy toned cream. Feels very nice going on and not greasy, just creamy. I saw an ad for it on an older actress and since I am "older" thought I would try. Very nice, and I like not wearing makeup occassionally and this just ads a nice glow.
In just a few days my skin has a new youthful glow and feels soft and supple. This product has done wonders for my 70 year old skin.

I received this product to do a review on. I do like the product. For me and my oily skin it feels heavy by the time I apply enough to feel moisturized. The rosy tone is nice. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recieved this from influenster and one of their boxes. Love it. Works all day, under my makeup and doesn't feel greasy. Im 52 so this is great for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm approaching 74 fast. I have natural rosy undertone to my skin. But after trying a sample I was sent. I love and need the moisturized and healthy look I get without using a makeup that tends to show during daytime.
Moisturizes well...puts a few roses in my cheeks... I look like; Whatever Happened to Baby Jane, when I wear makeup...so.... It's L'Oreal....they know what they're doing!

I was sent this to try and then review. I love the product. I almost 68. This made my skin feel amazing, wrinkles (which I have few) were less visible and people said I had a glow. Thank you ..you made me feel more beautiful [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I noticed the skin on my forehead felt rough and was afraid the rest of my face would become leather-like. Using Perfect Rosy Tone Moisturizer for just one week has my entire face feeling smooth and youthful. This rich moisturizer is just what dry, thirsty skin needs. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been looking for the perfect product for my aging skin and finally found it with this product. My skin is smooth and glowing. My mild rosecea and spider veins in my face also seem to be lighter. I'm 62 and most people guess my age to be mid 40s. Thank you loreal for this wonderful product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I loved the way it made my skin feel and look, definitely worth buying again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This is very heavy and feels smothering to the face. My skin wants to breakout. Was not what I expected. Would not purchase again.
This is an amazing face moisturizer, Skin feels soft and hydrant all day along. Hard to find in Fiji but I usually buy from USA.

I am definitely aging faster than I want. This Age Perfect Cell Renewal is a good addition to my skin care regimen. The cream is somewhat thick and pink in color. It spreads on easily and has a light tint to hide redness, age spots and more. It works to moisturize, hydrate and exfoliate your skin while stimulating new cell growth closer to the surface. With continued use, your skin will look brighter and smoother. I recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Before I started using Age Perfect, I hated getting up in the morning to see my drab skin. Since starting to use this product a few weeks ago, I've noticed the youthful radiance I remember from decades ago has returned. Thanks to Age Perfect Cell Renewal I again feel and look younger than my actual age. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been purchasing different moisturizers, trying to find the right one for me, and although this one has a pleasant scent and rosy tone, it's not creamy nor velvety enough to spread over my skin. I find myself having to tug at my face to spread it which isn't good, as that'll cause my face to lose elasticity. I'm going to resort to mixing this cream with a serum or another lotion just to be able to spread it all over my face and neck.
Loved the hint of rosiness. Great for my aging skin.
It is just as advertised. Very pleased with item

I received this complementary for testing. I love the tint as it helps to give your skin a rosy color without looking like makeup. It really helps to smooth the skin and make pores and fine wrinkles less noticeable. I saw results with the first use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this item as a complimentary gift from Influenster. The first thing I noticed was the amazing fragrance it has. Then I noticed how soft and fluffy it is and evenly it applies to your skin. Finally it has such a light coverage and light moisturization that my foundation sinks in like butter. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
After only a few days, I can see and feel a difference in my skin. It's smoother, tighter and has a nice glow.
My skin is very dry and this cream is wonderful. Rubs right in and has a lovely subtle scent. I love it
I received a free sample from #PinchMe. I am so glad i did. After the first use, i had to purchase some. I also bought the mask. My skin feels and is looking pretty good for s seasoned woman....
It was a very product, made my face very Rosie and I have a lot natural pink tones in face so not sure if that is a plus for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Received a sample of the cream via Pinchme.com. It went on very smooth and left a nice soft feel to my skin. I give it a thumbs up! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received L'Oréal Age Perfect Cell Renewal Rosy Tone Moisturizer complimentary for testing purposes from #Influenster. I used for about a month, and I definitely noticed a difference in the tone of my skin. The rosy glow of my youth was coming back. It is light weight and absorbs into my skin quickly without a greasy or sticky feeling after application. L'Oréal never disappoints with their amazing products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product. It makes my skin look great. The color is not strong, but just a hint of a faint rosie glow. I put it on before going to the kitchen along with a little creamy blush and just a touch of light lipstick. Makes me feel like I look nice. It's a good day cream. Try it, what do have to lose!

I bought this as I wanted to see if it really did give the rosy glow to my skin. I love L'Oreal skin products in general but I feel that this one, although nice on the skin, does not give the rosy glow that we see in the commercials. It's still a good moisturizer and possibly a cell renewal cream, that remains to be seen.

I saw this on TV and thought what the heck---I'll give it a try. My face is fairly wrinkled from all the laughing I've done (ha ha) but this product makes it feel soft and supple. It does give your skin a rosy look. I would recommend to a friend. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received my complimentary L'Oreal Paris Cell Renewal Rosy Tone Moisturizer from Influenster!! I have been using it for a couple of weeks now. I have noticed a big change in my skin. It has become firmer, softer, and I'm noticing fine lines and wrinkles disappear. I have never had a beauty routine before. I love my L'Oreal Paris Cell Renewal Rosy Tone Moisturizer!! Wouldn't trade it for the world thank you in Influenster!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Received a sample size, I was excited about it because it felt nice on my skin. Then I took a look in the mirror and noticed the shimmer all over my face. I was Extremely disappointed. They almost had me... [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Wow! This primer is so Hydrating, keeps my makeup from setting into fine lines and wrinkles!! My make up lasts all day even on hot summer days!! It gives a healthy glow! Doesn't feel heavy at all! My make up doesn't get all over my phone either! Very nice! I also use Loreal True Match Super Blendable Makeup. Thank you Loreal you never disappoint!!!!!
I got this sample and used and look 10 years younger [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
My skin has never looked and felt this good! Love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
love how my skin feels so soft, smooth and Rosy tone is a bonus. Will def buy again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I received a samlpes and l'oreal age perfect, was awesome feeling I my face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I received a free sample from #PinchMe and I loved it. It left my face so pretty and soft. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I brought skin care, hair care moisture and makeup products last week and I am highly satisfied [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I like the tint and the scent and the fact you use just a tad and will last forever but the product is very greasy if your not careful so I have to use little. I also do not notice it working
The product turns me orangy. My skin does not feel moisturized at all. Obviously I do not care for it at all. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I really love this cream, but how I wish it came with SPF in it. It would really complete the package!

I recieved this product complimentary from loreal through Influenster and have used daily for 2 weeks, I'm impressed with the quality, the texture, the smell and how well it works [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love using this. My face feels smooth and soft all day. It also smells good. I don't see that it tints my complexion. Adding some sunscreen would be great.
I am 70 years old and I can't believe how many compliments I've received about my skin tone. People cannot believe my age either. Love, love this product. I highly recommend.

I was so ready to love this product:) The ingredients and description sounded just like what I was hoping for. However! I can't get within 30 feet of an open bottle, it is highly perfumed ( from flower essence and fragrance). I am highly sensitive to perfume and when I opened the bottle I began to wheeze, cough and my eyes watered. Please make a fragrance-free version!

This product may have been wonderful IF they had not put a TON of glitter/sparkle in it!!! Since this is marketed for woman "of a certain age," it seems ridiculous to load it up with glitter!!! I will not be wearing it as it makes someone 'over forty' look absurd. This is a huge disappointment --- I think they should have disclosed the fact that is full of "glitter" on the packaging, so I wouldn't have wasted my money. Do NOT recommend!

Good Luck finding this stuff. I think I managed to grab the last jar in all of Oregon. To all reading this review, I couldn't find additional jars anywhere, not even on Amazon. That being said I can understand why it appears to be out of stock everywhere. It truly does give your skin a rosy appearance and it makes my face appear brighter. My friends have commented on how health my skin looks.

I had a pink toned moisturizer before and loved it but it's discontinued. Thus I got excited when I saw this one. Unfortunately, I don't notice any difference in the puffiness or crows feet and I haven't used it much because I can't seem to get over the 'gritty' feel of the cream. I was thinking that the pink color would add color to my face but so far it appears to disappear as I apply it. I'll keep trying it but so far, sorry Loreal, I'm disappointed.

Very attractive packing but more importantly applies smoothly and leaves my skin so soft and glowing. I am 73 and have only used L'Oreal liquid moisturizer on my face for many many years so it is a big deal to switch to a creamy moisturizer. If it contained sun screen protection the rating would have been 5 stars instead of 4 stars. CVS Pharmacy sold out had to drive to another town to find product.
LOVE IT!

At my age (61) and with my freckled face & many shades of grey hair, I love this product for the way it brightens my face! It smells great-- I am a gardener and I love peonies! I like products that make me feel beautiful, yet more than that products that benefit my aging skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I truly love this cream. I used to use Cyndi Crawford's Meaningful Beauty and this works better and faster! I am 57 and love the way my skin has responded to this. Now to be honest, I use this in the morning but a different deep wrinkle serum at night. However, as far as making my skin look good enough to actually even go out sometimes to run errands with just lipstick on, this has done it! I'm on my second jar and will never be without it as long as L'Oreal makes it!

I purchased this renewal cream several weeks ago, but have only been able to use it once. First let me say that the pink tone of the cream is perfect. It leaves a light, healthy glow on my face. My problem comes from the heavy fragrance. It is so strong that others were noticing the smell. Not unpleasant, just a strong perfume odor. Please Loreal, make an fragranced version of your cell renewal cream and I will be happy to use and review it.

I have been using this for two months now and notice a softness and glow to my skin. It is easy to apply and for a few minutes after application my face feels cool and rested. For the first time I feel comfortable without make-up for an everyday use; and when I want to put on a light make-up, I don't need as much and it goes on
very smoothly.

My skin looks better than it has in years! Imparts a beautiful healthy glow to my complexion. I love the smell. A little pricey, but look for it on sale with a coupon. A little goes a long way! I find that I don't need a foundation anymore. Definitely will buy again.

I am anti-lotion and anti-makeup but at age 49 my skin needed something. I apply every morning and love the change I see! Looking for a rich cleanser to pair with this. Unlike other reviewers I am glad there is no SPF as that changes the smell and consistency.

I received this about three weeks ago to review. It smooths on easily. I love the coverage and my skin looks like I have applied a foundation. My husband noticed and said good I look. Thank you for allowing me to try your product. Will continue to use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product really does work on me. After only a few weeks, my facial skin took on a rosy healthy moist look I haven't seen in decades. So many people kept saying I didn't look at all like 70 years old. The peony smell makes me so happy every time I open the jar.

Miraculous, no. Moisturizing, yes. I actually use it as a night moisturizer as it's too heavy for daytime for me. My skin is dry and definitely has signs of age, but my makeup tends to slide using this as a daytime moisturizer. Lightly scented. Having been using 2 weeks, it's ok.

I never did like wearing foundation. It makes my skin feel like it can't breathe. I've tried other tinted moisturizers but they always end up feeling too greasy. This is perfect. It gives a nice glow, is not greasy and doesn't feel like it is smothering my face. The only thing that could make it better would be to add SPF30 since it is for day wear.

I was extremely happy with the results of this product. I am almost 60 and have combination dry/oily skin. To my surprise, this product was able to take care of both without over doing it. Not to mention the scent was not offensive. It was quite nice, actually. At the end of the day, my skin was still hydrated and I received compliments from my friends about how dewy my skin looked. I would definitely use this product on a daily basis. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

i am 75 yrs old, i have tried so many products,finally gave up. when i saw this product i thought okay one more time. i received this 4 days ago and used it morning and night i already see a difference in my skin and wrinkles are already going away GREAT PRODUCT!!!!

I bought this after seeing the commercial and I love it. I have very dry skin and most moisturizers do not absorb. This went on smooth and absorbed. I have not noticed a rosy tone but you can't have everything, I have however noticed my wrinkles are not as deep which is a big plus. Just ordered a second jar.

I have been using Rosy Tone for about a month. I adore it! Just a hint of color makes my skin look dewy fresh and healthy. A light swipe of blush (or not) and my face is done beautifully! This is a must have for a healthy, beautiful, moisturized face!

It did not work as well as other L'Oréal products that I have used. The moisture feeling on my face did not last long. It seemed to give me a dry feeling within a couple of hours after use. I am 66 and live in Texas. I bought the product because of the person who was advertising it.

I received this product as a sample to try and review. I really like the product and will continue to use it. For me, it is great for the weekend when I only want to wear a little powder and lip color. I am 54 y.o. with more normal than dry skin. I could not wear my normal foundation over this as it was too moisture rich for me, but if your skin is on the dry side, you should try it - I think you will like it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I saw this at the store I decided to give it a try. It's now a must have. I have dark brown skin that is on the combo/dry side. This primer gives my skin a subtle glow and keeps my skin hydrated but not greasey or too shiney. Works great under my foundation and makes it look flawless! Please don't ever discontinue. Great primer!

I purchased this product in a drugstore when it first came out. I returned it (the store's policy allows return of any cosmetic a customer is unsatisfied with) the next day. The overwhelming "fragrance" in this product is very off-putting. Why does it have to smell like a cheap cologne? I would REALLY appreciate it if you returned to products that are only slightly scented or not scented at all. The Youth Code line was always my favorite because of the very slight fragrance that dissipated very quickly.

I won this product and absolutely love the way it makes my skin feel and look. It goes on smooth and gives my skin a little tone if I am not wearing make-up. I will be switching to Perfect Rosy Tone Moisturizer. It smells good too. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I haven't had much success with moisturizers as I have gotten older. When I was offered the L'Oreal Age Perfect, I thought I would try it. Wow, at the end of the day my skin feels dewy and fresh and dare I say it, I think my skin is in the best condition of my life. An absolute must for grownup ladies! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The look is pretty like on the TV ad, but not worth the price in my opinion. The reason for the 1 star is lack of moisture. This cream has no where near the moisturizing properties of the other products they make. It goes on nicely, but feels cakey after a while, so I end up putting my regular moisturizer over it, then light blush. That leaves me asking why this higher price and no advantage to putting it on? Won't buy this again. Sorry L'Oreal this is a fail.

I started using this product about 3 weeks ago on a daily basis and love it! My face doesn't feel dry at all even as the day goes on. My face feels smoother and rejuvenated. I won't go back to my previous face cream since this product is perfect for my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this as a testing sample. The product has a pleasant smell and is delivered in a nice package. Large size and attractive packaging. I wanted to love it, but alas even with the pretty color it did not moisturize my skin as I hoped. I used it religiously but never got the moisture I needed. The color of the product is pretty but I wasn't comfortable putting it on my face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
